Maybe he is better with older children than babies!! That is totally no excuse for him to treat you badly but some guys do better when they get just a little bigger!! Also, maybe you are having some post partum depression!! I had it bad I mean bad after my first, and I thought my husband was EVIL!!! Maybe try just talking to him and telling him how u feel! Only u know what will get his attention and make him listen calmly!! Stroke his ego a little if u must!! Then maybe talk to a Dr and tell them how you feel! Maybe there is something they can do to help u!! Good luck and hang in there, this will pass!!!

I agree to try and talk with your husband, wait until you can be calm and I would say don't try to address as soon as he gets home or walks in the door..it might go better if he has some time to  filter out work and all. You may want to talk to your doctor at your check up or if that is not an option you can call the hospital where you delivered and ask for reference/options for post par. depression. if both of those fall through you can also call/go to a Womans Care Center, I believe they offer these services as well. just don't give up!
